keyMoments.title: Nightmare Luffy's Dramatic Entrance
keyMoments.description: Luffy appears in his Nightmare form, powered by 100 shadows, with pale blue skin and a dramatically larger, bulkier body. He saves Usopp and Nami from Oars' crushing attack.
keyMoments.significance: Debut of one of Luffy's most unique and powerful temporary transformations, showing his ability to contain 100 shadows due to his strong spirit.

keyMoments.title: Nightmare Luffy Blocks Oars' Attack
keyMoments.description: Nightmare Luffy effortlessly blocks Oars' Gomu Gomu no Rifle with one hand, demonstrating vastly superior strength to his normal form.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the massive power increase from the 100 shadows, allowing Luffy to easily counter techniques that would normally challenge him.

keyMoments.title: Nightmare Luffy's Gomu Gomu no Storm
keyMoments.description: Nightmare Luffy uses his signature Gomu Gomu no Storm attack with enhanced power, sending Oars flying with a devastating barrage of punches.
keyMoments.significance: The climactic attack that defeats Oars, demonstrating the full extent of Nightmare Luffy's enhanced abilities.

abilities.description: Luffy absorbs 100 shadows, transforming into Nightmare Luffy with pale blue skin, increased size, dramatically enhanced strength and speed, and temporary swordsmanship abilities. The transformation lasts only 10 minutes.

reveals.information: Can contain 100 shadows due to exceptionally strong spirit, far beyond normal humans who can only handle 2-3 shadows
Gains swordsmanship skills from absorbed shadows, showing the transformation grants not just power but skills

keyMoments.title: Zoro Uses Yasha Garasu
keyMoments.description: Zoro attacks Oars' arm with his new Three Sword Style technique, Yasha Garasu (Yaksha Crow), spinning like a wheel while thrusting his swords to create cuts shaped like crow's feet.
keyMoments.significance: First use of this Three Sword Style technique, though it ultimately fails to stop Oars.

keyMoments.title: Zoro Defeated by Oars
keyMoments.description: Despite his attack, Zoro is knocked unconscious when Oars knees him powerfully into a wall.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the overwhelming power of Oars and the desperate situation the Straw Hats face.

abilities.description: A Three Sword Style technique where Zoro spins like a rolling wheel toward his enemy while continuously thrusting his swords, leaving cuts shaped like crow's feet.

keyMoments.title: Nami Crushed by Oars
keyMoments.description: After Oars crushes Usopp, Nami tries to plead for his life but is also crushed by the giant zombie.
keyMoments.significance: The darkest moment showing the Straw Hats' apparent defeat before Nightmare Luffy arrives.

keyMoments.title: Saved by Nightmare Luffy
keyMoments.description: Nami is revealed to have been saved by Nightmare Luffy and is shocked by his transformed appearance.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Nightmare Luffy's incredible speed and his dedication to protecting his crew.

keyMoments.title: Usopp's Salt Attack Fails
keyMoments.description: Usopp fires Brook's salt into Oars' mouth using Kuwagata, but Moria's shadow intercepts and destroys it, eliminating their zombie-purifying weapon.
keyMoments.significance: The failure forces the crew to rely on pure combat strength without their anti-zombie strategy.

keyMoments.title: Usopp Crushed by Oars
keyMoments.description: Oars crushes Usopp under his massive foot, nearly killing him before Nightmare Luffy's intervention.
keyMoments.significance: Part of the darkest moment in the battle, showing the crew's desperate situation.

keyMoments.title: Moria Intercepts Salt Attack
keyMoments.description: Moria uses his shadow to catch and destroy the salt that Usopp shot into Oars' mouth, preventing the zombie's purification.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Moria's tactical awareness and his ability to control shadows at a distance.

keyMoments.title: Moria Attempts Escape
keyMoments.description: Facing Nightmare Luffy's overwhelming power, the Warlord attempts to flee rather than continue fighting.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that even a Warlord of the Sea recognizes when outmatched, showing Nightmare Luffy's threat level.

keyMoments.title: Hit by Nightmare Luffy's Gomu Gomu no Pistol
keyMoments.description: Moria is struck by Nightmare Luffy's enhanced Gomu Gomu no Pistol and sent flying.
keyMoments.significance: First direct hit on Moria this episode, proving Nightmare Luffy can fight both him and Oars.

keyMoments.title: Oars Defeats Zoro
keyMoments.description: Oars knees Zoro into a wall, knocking out one of the Straw Hats' strongest fighters.

keyMoments.title: Oars Overpowered by Nightmare Luffy
keyMoments.description: Nightmare Luffy grabs Oars by the hair and swings the massive zombie around before slamming him into the ground.
keyMoments.significance: Complete reversal showing that Nightmare Luffy far exceeds Oars in strength.

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Gomu Gomu no Storm
keyMoments.description: Oars is sent flying by Nightmare Luffy's devastating Gomu Gomu no Storm attack.
keyMoments.significance: Apparent defeat of the giant zombie that had dominated the battle.

reveals.information: Despite possessing Luffy's shadow and abilities, Oars lacks the combat instinct and creativity of the original

name.japanese: シャーロット・ローラ

keyMoments.title: Lola Leads Rescue of Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Lola orders the Rolling Pirates to get the heavily injured Straw Hat crew members to safety while Nightmare Luffy battles Oars and Moria.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the alliance and bonds formed between the crews during the Thriller Bark adventure.
